title: The Great Hunt
comment: This was a bit dissapointing after the first book, the characters where never really developed or grew.

title: Moonwalking With Einstein
comment: A very entertaining story, although not very practicle it gives a great insight to many parlor tricks and some good tips on keeping your memory fresh.

title: A Game of Thrones
comment: Really a great read, there is so much depth and every character feels very well constructed.

title: Surely You're Joking, Mr. Feynmen!
comment: My favorite book, Feynmen is pure genius.

title: Atlas Shrugged
comment: This book was a tough read, Rand really loves to knock you over the head with her beliefs. I did enjoy the book, but had to skim a few chapters just to get through it.

title: Lies My Teacher Told Me
comment: Very interesting, it is a great book to just pick up and read a chapter when you have time.

title: Open
comment: A great book for any tennis fans. Agassi does a great job explaining the pressures that he had to deal with as a pro athlete.

title: Life of PI
comment: I had a tough time getting through this book, but I really enjoyed the imagery.

title: Mind Gym
comment: This book really helps you mentally prepare for challenges. I found it most useful when applied to athletics, but I am sure some of it could be applied to other areas in life.

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
